files.description: Python script that deterministically creates /outputs/README.md and the initial required pipeline artifacts (roadmap, bibliography, coverage matrix) following defined conventions.
Defines artifact rules, naming conventions, determinism guarantees, and update cadence for all files produced under /outputs/.
Project roadmap artifact capturing milestones, cycles, deliverables, and evolution plan for subsequent pipeline runs.
Curated bibliography artifact listing sources, links, and citation notes used by the project and its agents.
Structured coverage matrix artifact mapping requirements to files, tests, and CI checks to track completeness over time.
GitHub Actions workflow that runs the generator script on pushes/PRs, validates determinism, and uploads /outputs/ artifacts.
Project configuration defining Python tooling, formatting/linting settings, and an entry for running the outputs generator in CI.
Repository-level documentation explaining how to run the generator locally and how CI/CD enforces stable /outputs/ artifacts.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/README.md specifying artifact rules/conventions and immediately add the first required pipeline artifacts (roadmap, bibliography docs, coverage matrix) so subsequent cycles build on a stable structure.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
